mapper.select: select exists (select * from cafe_map_review where cafe_id = #{cafe_id} and user_id = #{user_id}) as success
mapper.insert: insert into cafe_map_review(cafe_id, user_id, review_date, star_rating, content, like_number, category_1, category_2, category_3) value (#{cafe_id}, #{user_id}, #{review_date}, #{star_rating}, #{content}, #{like_number}, #{category_1}, #{category_2}, #{category_3})
mapper.select: select exists (select * from cafe_map_review where review_id = #{review_id} and cafe_id = #{cafe_id} and user_id = #{user_id}) as success
select cast((sum(star_rating) / count(star_rating)) as double) as total_rating from cafe_map_review where cafe_id = #{cafe_id}
select category_1, category_2, category_3 from cafe_map_review where review_id = #{review_id}
